members.member:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
ImportModule implements the IPortable ImportModule Interface
The Id of the module to be imported The content to be imported The version of the module to be imported The Id of the user performing the import -----------------------------------------------------------------------------

member.summary: The content class used for creating and maintaining content items

member.summary: This should only run after the Article exists in the data store.
member.returns: The newly created ContentItemID from the data store.

member.name: M:Christoc.Modules.dnnsimplearticle.Components.Taxonomy.Content.UpdateContentItem(Christoc.Modules.dnnsimplearticle.Components.Article,System.Int32)
member.summary: This is used to update the content in the ContentItems table. Should be called when an Article is updated.

member.name: M:Christoc.Modules.dnnsimplearticle.Components.Taxonomy.Content.DeleteContentItem(Christoc.Modules.dnnsimplearticle.Components.Article)
member.summary: This removes a content item associated with an article from the data store. Should run every time an article is deleted.
member.param: The Content Item we wish to remove from the data store.

member.name: M:Christoc.Modules.dnnsimplearticle.Components.Taxonomy.Content.CreateContentType
member.summary: Creates a Content Type (for taxonomy) in the data store.
member.returns: The primary key value of the new ContentType.
